Product Features

White, short sleeve, sports T-shirt, classic design, with colourful logo for 100 years of AGH UST. Round neck type of neckline. Ideal for running, cycling, and functional training. Available in unisex style.  

Product description   
sizes from S to XXL  
type: T-shirt  
colour: white   
type of print: thermal printing  
colour of print: different colours  
fabric: 100% polyester
